name: White Space (Mihajlo Stefanović)
description:
You are in the white void that is not bright at all. Stuck in this weird but personal place you try to get out. But it's not that easy. As you go higher in attempt to escape the ground becomes more unstable, moving faster and faster, can you get ahold of it? Will you be stuck in an endless-lop or will the day finally illuminate the darkness?

Artistic, creepy platformer with random generation.

Made for PROCJAM in a week. It has been so fun making this! Hope you enjoy it!

You can follow me on twitter at: https://twitter.com/Droldov

My email: mihajlostefanovic51@gmail.com

Music by: https://www.facebook.com/dusan.kolak
